title: Signals Master
description: A cadet training and examination platform for mastering international signal pennants. Features progression tracking, study materials, formal exams with 80% pass threshold, and admin oversight for evaluation and record-keeping.

title: Jame Game Christmas Edition
description: A beginner-friendly game jam (Christmas) edition -- Not sure what I want to make, but the theme will be given out on December 17, and I'll have until December 24, 2025 to submit my entry!.

title: Cadet Inventory Management System
description: A professional, enterprise-style web application designed to manage inventory, loan requests, and logistics for a cadet organization. Provides a structured, multi-role access model to ensure efficient operations.
